translations: （数量的）优势，普遍；主导地位，支配地位

sentences.sentence: Since the former is most common among those inclined towards indifferent relationships, their predominance can bolster individuals' sense of self-worth.
sentences.translation: 由于前者在那些倾向于淡漠关系的人群中最为常见，它们的优势可以增强个体的自我价值感。

sentences.sentence: Only one quarter of the study participants had what the researchers call "eudaemonic predominance"—that is, their sense of meaning outpaced their feelings of happiness.
sentences.translation: 只有四分之一的参与者拥有研究人员所称的“幸福感优势”——也就是说，他们（生活）的意义感超过了他们（生活）的幸福感。

sentences.sentence: Eventually even their economic predominance was to suffer.
sentences.translation: 甚至最终，他们在经济上的主导地位也会受损。
